name: Expedited Ethics Application Form
description: This form provides the questions for the expedited application to the ethics committee

components.title: Principal Investigator (supervisor)
components.name: principal_investigator_name
components._comment: A Text Question represents a standard HTML input/textarea. It is a textarea if singleLine if false. True is default

options.label: I, the supervisor, confirm that I have reviewed this application and agree to its submission for review

components.title: End date of which approval is sought
components.name: approval_end_date

components.title: Note on the following 3 sections
content: If the research is to be conducted during or after/associated with School Placement, and within the Department of Education subject syllabus outline,
and provided the student has the permission of the class teacher and the school principal and that parent/guardians consent to participation,
you do not need to tick any box in the next 3 sections.
A Child Protection form, signed by all researchers involved, must be attached to the application. Please note that
if the Faculty Ethics Committee deems it necessary, you may be asked to fill in the full application form
components._comment: This component represents a component that can display a block of text. The content can be defined as a single string, or an array of strings. The array will be concatenated into one string when parsed

components.title: Human Participants
components.description: If any of the following options are checked, a full application will have to be filled out

components.title: Does the research proposal involve any of the below

checkboxes.title: Any person under the age of 18?
Relatives of ill people (e.g. parents of sick children)?
Adults under the protection/control/influence of others (e.g. in care/prison)?
People who may only have a basic knowledge of English?
Hospital or GP patients (or HSE members of staff) recruited in medical facility?

branch.comment: We cannot process this application. Please contact HSE's ethics committee

components._comment: A checkbox group allows a branch (either defaultBranch or a defined branch) to be executed if one of the checkboxes are checked

components.title: Subject Matter
components.description: If any of the following options are checked, a full application will have to be filled out

components.title: Does the research proposal involve any of the below

checkboxes.title: Sensitive personal issues? (e.g. suicide, bereavement, gender identity, sexuality, fertility, abortion, gambling)?
Illegal activities, illicit drug taking, substance abuse or the self reporting of criminal behaviour?
Any act that might diminish self-respect or cause shame, embarrassment or regret?
Research into politically and/or racially/ethnically and/or commercially sensitive areas?

components.title: Procedures
components.description: If any of the following options are checked, a full application will have to be filled out

components.title: Does the research proposal involve any of the below

checkboxes.title: Use of personal records without consent?
The offer of large inducements to participate?
Audio or visual recording without consent?
Research that might put researchers or participants at risk?
Storage of results data for less than 7 years?

components.title: Research Project Information
description: Please remember to give enough detail on what the participants will be doing in the study so that
full ethical consideration can be given in assessing the study (i.e. help the committee understand the project methods)
components._comment: Since descriptions can be also long, they can be broken into array of strings also

components.title: Give a description of the research
components.description: Give details of what you and the participant will be doing for this study, e.g. Interview, Online survey, Workshop, Prototype testing.
components.name: research_description

question.title: Which of the following will the recordings be (can be both)?
question.name: recording_type

question.title: Please state what will be recorded - participant's face, or just hands/gestures
question.name: what_will_be_recorded

question.title: Why is the recording required?
question.name: why_recording_required
question.description: Recording must be destroyed after transcription, please state this

question.title: If Yes, what format will the prototype take, what will it do, how will it be used?
question.name: prototype_format

components.title: How many participants will be involved?
components.name: num_participants_involved
components.description: Please state the minimum number of participants needed for this study and the ideal maximum number of participants.

components.title: How do you plan to gain access to/contact/approach potential participants?
components.name: participants_access
description: If using emails, how will you get the email addresses? It is important that you have permission to contact certain
groups, e.g. Class list, sports organisation, UL society or club. If using social media, please provide
the advert/text/tweet/message used to contact participants

components.title: What are the criteria for including/excluding individuals from the study?
components.name: study_inclusion_criteria

question.title: Have arrangements been made to accommodate individuals who do not wish to participate in the research?
question.description: NB This mainly relates to research taking place in a classroom setting, please tick N/A if your research is not taking place in a classroom

question.title: Please state what these arrangements are.
question.name: accommodate_arrangements

components.title: Can you identify any particular vulnerability of your participants other than those mentioned in previous sections?
components.description: Please review the other sections before completing
components.name: other_vulnerabilities

components.title: Where will the study take place?
description: Please ensure that it is based in UL(where possible). Please state where in UL(or otherwise) it is
taking place. Please detail how COVID restrictions will be considered and ensured in your study.
components.name: study_location

components.title: What arrangements have you made for anonymity and confidentiality?
components.description: How will participants be referenced in the final report? Please ensure a code is used
components.name: anonymity_arrangements

components.title: What are the safety issues (if any) arising from this study, and how will you deal with them?
components.description: How will the participants safety be guaranteed in the studies where there is an activity or intervention?
components.name: safety_issues

components.title: All data must be stored for 7 years following completion of the project.

question.title: How do you propose to store the information once the project is completed? Will the file/computer be password protected?
question.description: Information must not be stored on student's PC or on a USB key
question.name: store_information

question.title: Where will the information be stored (room number)?
question.description: This would normally be the supervisor's room number. They take responsibility of this
question.name: information_storage_room

components.title: Insurance Cover
description: Insurance cover is required for all research carried out by UL employees. Principal Investigators/Supervisors
should carefully view the University’s ‘Guidelines on Insurance Cover for Research’ document and the University’s
Insurance cover to ascertain if their proposed research is covered. These documents are available at www.ul.ie/insurance. \n
Where any query arises about whether or not proposed research is covered by insurance, the Principal Investigator/Supervisor must
contact the University’s Insurance Administrator at cliona.donnellan@ul.ie to confirm that the required level of insurance cover is in place.\n
Please indicate by way of signature that the research project is covered by UL's insurance policies
components.name: insurance_signature
components.label: PI/Supervisor signature

components.title: Research Privacy Notice
description: The Research Privacy Notice must be provided to all participants. It is the responsibility of the Principal Investigator to make sure
that it has been completed correctly. This form will not be reviewed by the S&E Research Ethics Committee.\n
Please indicate by way of signature that the Research Privacy Notice form has been completed:
components.name: insurance_signature
components.label: PI/Supervisor signature

components.title: Please attach relevant information documents and complete the following checklist to indicate which documents are included with the application

checkboxes.title: Child Protection Form (must be included if dealing with <18 year olds)

components.title: Declaration
description: The information in this form is accurate to the best of my knowledge and belief and I
take full responsibility for it. I undertake to abide by the guidelines outlined in the UL
Research Ethics Committee guidelines http://www.ul.ie/researchethics/
I undertake to inform S&EEC of any changes to the study from those detailed in this application.

components.title: Principal Investigator Name*
components.description: *In the case where the principal investigator is not a permanent employee of the University, the relevant head of department must sign this declaration in their place
components.name: pi_declaration_name

components._comment: A container provides a means of grouping sections together under one container. It is not a visual component, but can be replaced with another container
